props.name: as
props.description: The element or component this component should render as. Can be overwritten by `asChild`.

props.name: asChild
props.description:
Change the default rendered element for the one passed as a child, merging their props and behavior.

Read our [Composition](https://akar.vinicunca.dev/core/guides/composition) guide for more details.

props.name: defaultValue
props.description: The value of the slider when initially rendered. Use when you do not need to control the state of the slider.

props.name: dir
props.description:
The reading direction of the combobox when applicable.
If omitted, inherits globally from `AConfigProvider` or assumes LTR (left-to-right) reading mode.

props.name: disabled
props.description: When `true`, prevents the user from interacting with the slider.

props.name: inverted
props.description: Whether the slider is visually inverted.

props.name: max
props.description: The maximum value for the range.

props.name: min
props.description: The minimum value for the range.

props.name: minStepsBetweenThumbs
props.description: The minimum permitted steps between multiple thumbs.

props.name: modelValue
props.description: The controlled value of the slider. Can be bind as `v-model`.

props.name: name
props.description: The name of the field. Submitted with its owning form as part of a name/value pair.

props.name: required
props.description: When `true`, indicates that the user must set the value before the owning form can be submitted.

props.name: thumbAlignment
props.description:
The alignment of the slider thumb.
- `contain`: thumbs will be contained within the bounds of the track.
- `overflow`: thumbs will not be bound by the track. No extra offset will be added.

events.name: update:modelValue
events.description: Event handler called when the slider value changes

events.name: valueCommit
events.description:
Event handler called when the value changes at the end of an interaction.
   
    Useful when you only need to capture a final value e.g. to update a backend service.
